params.hints:
Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan

statements.sql: select `description`, `link`, `user_notification`.`is_read`, `notifications`.`updated_at`, `model_type`, `model_id`, `type_notification_id`, `user_notification`.`user_id` as `pivot_user_id`, `user_notification`.`notification_id` as `pivot_notification_id` from `notifications` inner join `user_notification` on `notifications`.`id` = `user_notification`.`notification_id` where `user_notification`.`user_id` = '1' order by `updated_at` desc
